contentList.content: This character is using class progressions.
Class Progressions: Barbarian
Class Progressions: Bard
Class Progressions: Cleric
Class Progressions: Druid
Class Progressions: Fighter
Class Progressions: Monk
Class Progressions: Paladin
Class Progressions: Ranger
Class Progressions: Rogue
Class Progressions: Sorcerer
Class Progressions: Warlock
Class Progressions: Wizard
Class Progressions: Flaming Fist Melee Attacker
Class Progressions: Flaming Fist Melee Defender
Class Progressions: Flaming Fist Ranger
Class Progressions: Flaming Fist Cleric
Class Progressions: Flaming Fist Caster
Combat Extender: Boss Boost
A being of large import They gain boss boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Mini-Boss Boost
A being of some import. They gain mini-boss boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Martial Boost
A character with experience in martial combat. They gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with Martial Weapons, in addition to boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Magic Boost
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain a 30% increase to their spell's range, in addition to Magic boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Barbarian Boost
A character who harnesses their fury to punish foes. They gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Interrupt_RecklessAttack">Reckless Attack</LSTag>, in addition to Barbarian boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Berserker Barbarian Boost
A Barbarian who follows a path of untrammelled fury and thrills in the chaos of battle, regardless of their own well-being. They gain Berserker subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Barbarian Boost
A Barbarian suffused with the wild influence of arcane power waiting to be released. They gain Wild Magic subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Bard Boost
A character with a versatile skillset, who blends artistry, trickery, and spellcraft. They gain Bard boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Druid Boost
A character who commands the forces of nature, shaping the world with primal magic. They gain Druid boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Circle of the Moon Druid Boost
A Druid who specializes in Wild Shaping into massive beasts or even primal elementals. They gain Circle of the Moon subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Circle of the Spores Druid Boost
A Druid who uses fungal growth and decay to augment themselves and harm their foes. They gain Circle of the Spores subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Cleric Boost
A character of faith, channeling divine magic both to aid and harm. They gain Cleric boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Fighter Boost
A character who has mastered weapons and tactics, excelling in martial combat. They gain Fighter boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Battle Master Fighter Boost
A paragon of tactical superiority, who can employ a wide array of combat manoeuvres to dominate every fight. They gain Battle Master subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Eldritch Knight Fighter Boost
A warrior of spell and sword who weaves incantations to supplement their martial expertise. They gain Eldritch Knight subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Monk Boost
A character who has mastered body, mind and the art of combat. They gain Monk boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Way of the Open Hand Monk Boost
A Monk who specializes in unarmed combat. They gain Way of the Open Hand subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Way of the Four Elements Monk Boost
A Monk who uses their ki to bend the elements to their will. They gain Way of the Four Elements subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Paladin Boost
A character who upholds or neglects a sacred oath, a warrior of divinity or demise. They gain Paladin boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Oath of Devotion Paladin Boost
A Paladin who acts with honour and virtue to protect the weak and pursue the greater good. They gain Oath of Devotion subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Oath of Vengeance Paladin Boost
A Paladin who set aside their own purity to right wrongs and deliver justice by any means necessary. They gain Oath of Vengeance subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Oathbreaker Paladin Boost
A Paladin who broke their Oath in pursuit of power and ambition. They gain Oathbreaker subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Ranger Boost
A character who blends martial prowess with nature's magic. They gain Ranger boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Beast Master Ranger Boost
A Ranger who can summon an animal companion to aid them in combat. They gain Beast Master subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Hunter Ranger Boost
A Ranger who excels at slaying the most dangerous prey. They gain Hunter subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Rogue Boost
A character who excels in stealth, strategy, and quick thinking. They gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag>, in addition to Rogue boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Sorcerer Boost
A character with raw arcane power, shaping magic through will alone. They gain Sorcerer boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Warlock Boost
A character who wields eldritch magic granted by a supernatural patron. They gain Warlock boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Wizard Boost
A character who masters the weave through study and intellect. They gain Wizard boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Evocation Wizard Boost
A Wizard who specializes in offensive magic. They gain Evocation School subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Necromancy Wizard Boost
A Ranger who specializes in the powers of death. They gain Necromancy School subclass boosts from configuration.
Combat Extender: Level 1 Spells
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
Combat Extender: Level 2 Spells
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
Combat Extender: Level 3 Spells
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
Combat Extender: Level 4 Spells
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
Combat Extender: Level 5 Spells
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
Combat Extender: Level 6 Spells
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
Combat Extender: Level 1 Spells - Control
They gain access to spells from configuration.
Combat Extender: Level 2 Spells - Control
They gain access to spells from configuration.
Combat Extender: Level 3 Spells - Control
They gain access to spells from configuration.
Combat Extender: Level 4 Spells - Control
They gain access to spells from configuration.
Combat Extender: Level 5 Spells - Control
They gain access to spells from configuration.
Combat Extender: Level 6 Spells - Control
They gain access to spells from configuration.
